alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Emery and east central Sevier Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 27 miles northeast of Loa, or 34 miles north of Capitol Reef National Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fremont Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 84 and 102. Utah Route 10 between mile markers 0 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
